user.title: Setup Clockwork
user.description: Create a Clockwork instance for date and time calculations

abort.no_custom_holidays: No custom holidays to modify or delete

add_calculation.title: Add Calculation
add_calculation.description: Choose the type of calculation to add

timespan.title: Timespan Calculation
timespan.description: Calculate duration since an entity changed state

data_description.track_state: Which state to track: 'on' (turns ON), 'off' (turns OFF), or 'both' (any state change)
data_description.update_interval: How often to update the timespan value (in seconds). Minimum 1 second. Default: 60 seconds.

offset.title: Offset Calculation
offset.description: Add time offset to when an entity changes state

data_description.offset_mode: pulse: turns ON for pulse_duration then OFF | duration: stays ON until trigger condition ends | latch: turns ON and stays ON
data_description.pulse_duration: How long pulse stays ON (e.g., '5 minutes'). If not set, equals offset time.
data_description.trigger_on: Which state change triggers: on (turns ON), off (turns OFF), or both (any state change). Applies to all modes.

datetime_offset.title: Datetime Offset
datetime_offset.description: Apply time offset to a datetime entity/helper

date_range.title: Date Range Duration
date_range.description: Measure duration between two datetime entities

season.title: Season Detection
season.description: Check if current date is within a season

data_description.season: Choose: spring, summer, autumn, or winter

month.title: Month Detection
month.description: Check if current date is within specified months

holiday.title: Holiday Countdown
holiday.description: Calculate days until a US holiday

data_description.holiday: Choose a US holiday: new_years_day, mlk_day, presidents_day, memorial_day, juneteenth, independence_day, labor_day, columbus_day, veterans_day, thanksgiving, christmas

between_dates.title: Between Dates Check
between_dates.description: Binary sensor true when current time is between two datetimes

outside_dates.title: Outside Dates Check
outside_dates.description: Binary sensor true when current time is OUTSIDE a date range

custom_holiday.title: Define Custom Holiday
custom_holiday.description: Add a custom holiday for use in holiday countdown calculations

data_description.name: e.g., 'Easter Sunday' or 'My Birthday' (the identifier will be created automatically)
data_description.holiday_type: fixed: specific date | nth_weekday: Nth day of week in month | last_weekday: last occurrence
data_description.occurrence: Which occurrence of the weekday (1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, or 5th)
